content:
You're welcome! That's a great plan to start exploring local art galleries and museums that feature abstract art exhibitions. Reaching out to the artist who created the abstract painting you purchased is an excellent idea, as they may have valuable insights and connections to the local art community.

Remember to also check social media platforms like Instagram and Facebook, as many galleries and museums use these platforms to promote their exhibitions and events. You can also search for hashtags related to abstract art, local art, and art exhibitions to discover new galleries and museums in your area.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more advice or guidance. I'm excited to hear about your discoveries and experiences as you explore the world of abstract art in your local community!

**Additional Tip:** Consider taking notes or creating a list of the galleries and museums you're interested in, along with their exhibition schedules and contact information. This will help you keep track of upcoming exhibitions and events, and make it easier to plan your visits.

Good luck, and have fun exploring the world of abstract art!
